comment.body: The rich and powerful are an embarrassment to the people

It is nice, but I would change some colors...e.g. check out the page http://paletton.com/#uid=23i0u0k1Xqw4Fvi3tot56l+76k8

or Android material design: https://material.google.com/style/color.html#color-color-palette

In my personal opinion, this orange doesn't go well with the grey
I get your point...it's just what first came to my mind when looking at the page.
Yes that is true. Although I do find it quite helpful until we get notified when someone comments on our posts.
nice blog, I'll keep seeding man :)
Now we get notifications when we subscribe through the three little dots in the top right. That's how I found your comment ;)
do you have a wikipedia link or anything for the markdowns that can be used in ZeroNet? Or a Zero blog ;)
Let me guess, is it from Microsoft what you are talking about :D
@Alek: or Jitsi with xmpp if it shall replace Skype, but its not decentralised.

@Deadjoker: Chrome OS is total crap...In my opinion, even more than for desktop we really need an alternative OS for mobile devices. There is only iOS and Android (sorry Windows phone), which are both shaped by corporate interests - their profits will always be more important than security & privacy. Future government policies (e.g. encryption bans/backdoors) will most likely influence their development, too.
The link does not work for me
@Deadjoker: Are you sure that "ipfs" belongs into that link? The siteCreate command wouldn't generate a such link would it
@Kaffie: okay, I didn't know that with zero net I cannot access it.

You can use optional files or whole directories of them just look up the wiki, the files will only get downloaded when the visitor accesses them http://127.0.0.1:43110/17Kom2G5qNDc6NaQwv445h1gFzxkY3ZtZe/site_development/content_json/

optional

Preg pattern of optional files

Example: (data/mp4/.*|updater/.*) (everything in data/mp4 and updater directory is optional)
@ks: You might like the Kinks then: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VLs09J_x6-c
